body: For the 2 who said he wasted his military training, can't you see he is walking with a walking stick? How can he kill anyone in that state? He's not in the best condition to kill anyone. He should be commended for not following the usual NTR mc crap by crying and Fapping on his wife getting fucked, but tried to swing his walking stick at the guy who fucked her. And he's being ambushed from the back by someone else, who the heck can fight when ambushed?
The dudes a military man and still fail to kill these people what a waste of training
...Almost every fuckin tank,story,doujin someone shit out to this fuckin site is fucking NTRASH.What the fuck is wrong with you people? -- MEMBER OF ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --
